description: Detects potential privilege escalation attempt via the creation of the "*.Exe.Local" folder inside the "System32" directory in order to sideload "comctl32.dll"
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
Subhash P (@pbssubhash)
name: Potential Privilege Escalation Attempt Via .Exe.Local Technique
query: (file.path.text:(C\:\\Windows\\System32\\logonUI.exe.local* OR C\:\\Windows\\System32\\werFault.exe.local* OR C\:\\Windows\\System32\\consent.exe.local* OR C\:\\Windows\\System32\\narrator.exe.local* OR C\:\\Windows\\System32\\wermgr.exe.local*) AND file.path.text:*\\comctl32.dll)
